-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A photo album middleware
--   
--   It checks for a plugin tag in html and generate a photo album with
--   thumbnails in place, by some internal IO options. The current version
--   makes some assumptions on where the photo should be stored, so it's
--   mostly useful for bamboo. A download of appropriate javascript is
--   required, e.g. innerfade.js.
@package bamboo-plugin-photo
@version 2009.7.5

module Bamboo.Plugin.Photo.Config
album_id :: String
db_id :: String
db_uri :: String
image_id :: String
image_uri :: String
picture_prefix :: String
plugin_id :: String
plugin_type_key :: String
plugin_type_value :: String
public_id :: String
public_uri :: String
thumb_id :: String

module Bamboo.Plugin.Photo.Util
mkdir :: String -> IO ()
show_data :: (Show a) => a -> String
parse_boolean :: String -> Bool
ls_l :: String -> IO [String]
image_path :: String -> String
spaced_url :: String -> String
id_to_resource :: String -> String

module Bamboo.Plugin.Photo.Model
data AlbumTypeData
Galleria :: AlbumTypeData
Fade :: AlbumTypeData
SlideViewer :: AlbumTypeData
Popeye :: AlbumTypeData
data Album
Album :: String -> String -> Bool -> AlbumTypeData -> Int -> [String] -> Album
uid :: Album -> String
prefix :: Album -> String
show_description :: Album -> Bool
album_type :: Album -> AlbumTypeData
width :: Album -> Int
pictures :: Album -> [String]
get :: String -> Bool -> AlbumTypeData -> Int -> String -> IO Album
get_pictures :: String -> IO [String]
get_picture_title :: String -> String -> String
for_post :: String -> String -> IO Album
picture_links :: Album -> [String]
picture_thumbs :: Album -> [String]
picture_titles :: Album -> [String]
data_list :: Album -> [(String, String, String)]
data AlbumData
Prefix :: AlbumData
Name :: AlbumData
Pictures :: AlbumData
ShowDescription :: AlbumData
AlbumType :: AlbumData
Width :: AlbumData
from_list :: [(String, String)] -> IO Album
convert_if_missing_thumb :: Int -> String -> IO ()
convert :: Int -> String -> IO ()
image_extensions :: [String]
is_image :: String -> Bool
convert_cmd :: Int -> String -> String -> IO ExitCode
instance Show AlbumData
instance Show Album
instance Eq Album
instance Eq AlbumTypeData
instance Show AlbumTypeData
instance Read AlbumTypeData
instance Default AlbumTypeData

module Bamboo.Plugin.Photo.View
id :: String -> HtmlAttr
div_id :: String -> Html -> Html
div_class :: String -> Html -> Html
div_class_id :: String -> String -> Html -> Html
span :: Html -> Html
div :: Html -> Html
d :: Html -> Html
ul :: Html -> Html
klass :: String -> HtmlAttr
c :: String -> Html -> Html
ci :: String -> String -> Html -> Html
ic :: String -> String -> Html -> Html
link :: String -> Html -> HotLink
img :: Html
space_html :: Html
render :: Album -> Html
empty_html :: Html
show_album :: Album -> Html
show_popeye :: Album -> Html
show_slide_viewer :: Album -> Html
show_galleria :: Album -> Html
show_fade :: Album -> Html

module Bamboo.Plugin.Photo
photo :: Middleware
